Uses of Class
com.cloudera.oryx.serving.web.AbstractOryxServlet

  • Packages that use AbstractOryxServlet 
    Package Description
    com.cloudera.oryx.als.serving.web  
    com.cloudera.oryx.kmeans.serving.web  
    com.cloudera.oryx.rdf.serving.web  

    • Uses of AbstractOryxServlet in com.cloudera.oryx.als.serving.web

      Subclasses of AbstractOryxServlet in com.cloudera.oryx.als.serving.web 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractALSServlet
      Superclass of all servletes used in the ALS recommender API.
      class  BecauseServlet
      Responds to a GET request to /because/[userID]/[itemID]?howMany=n, and in turn calls OryxRecommender.recommendedBecause(String, String, int).
      class  EstimateForAnonymousServlet
      Responds to a GET request to /estimateForAnonymous/[toItemID]/[itemID1(=value1)](/[itemID2(=value2)]/...), and in turn calls OryxRecommender.estimateForAnonymous(String, String[], float[]) with the supplied values.
      class  EstimateServlet
      Responds to a GET request to /estimate/[userID]/[itemID] and in turn calls OryxRecommender.estimatePreference(String, String).
      class  IngestServlet
      Responds to a POST request to /ingest and in turn calls OryxRecommender.ingest(Reader)}.
      class  MostPopularItemsServlet
      Responds to a GET request to /mostPopularItems(?howMany=n) and in turn calls OryxRecommender.mostPopularItems(int).
      class  PreferenceServlet
      Responds to a POST request to /pref/[userID]/[itemID] and in turn calls OryxRecommender.setPreference(String, String, float).
      class  ReadyServlet
      Responds to a HEAD or GET request to /ready and in turn calls OryxRecommender.isReady().
      class  RecommendServlet
      Responds to a GET request to /recommend/[userID](?howMany=n)(&considerKnownItems=true|false)(&rescorerParams=...) and in turn calls OryxRecommender.recommend(String, int).
      class  RecommendToAnonymousServlet
      Responds to a GET request to /recommendToAnonymous/[itemID1(=value1)](/[itemID2(=value2)]/...)?howMany=n[&rescorerParams=...], and in turn calls OryxRecommender.recommendToAnonymous(String[], float[], int, Rescorer) with the supplied values.
      class  RecommendToManyServlet
      Responds to a GET request to /recommendToMany/[userID1](/[userID2]/...)(?howMany=n)(&considerKnownItems=true|false)(&rescorerParams=...) and in turn calls OryxRecommender.recommendToMany(String[], int, boolean, Rescorer).
      class  RefreshServlet
      Responds to a POST request to /refresh, and in turn calls OryxRecommender.refresh().
      class  SimilarityServlet
      Responds to a GET request to /similarity/[itemID1](/[itemID2]/...)?howMany=n(&rescorerParams=...), and in turn calls OryxRecommender.mostSimilarItems(String[], int) with the supplied values.
      class  SimilarityToItemServlet
      Responds to a GET request to /similarityToItem/[toItemID]/itemID1(/[itemID2]/...), and in turn calls OryxRecommender.similarityToItem(String, String...) with the supplied values.

    • Uses of AbstractOryxServlet in com.cloudera.oryx.kmeans.serving.web

      class  AbstractKMeansServlet 
      class  AddServlet
      Responsds to POST request to /add.
      class  AssignServlet
      Responsds to a GET request to /assign/[datum].
      class  DistanceToNearestServlet
      Responsds to a GET request to /distanceToNearest/[datum].

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractRDFServlet 
      class  ClassifyServlet
      Responsds to a GET request to /classify/[datum].
      class  TrainServlet
      Responsds to POST request to /train.
